ingredients.ingredient: 1 (9.6 ounce) package Johnsonville® Fully Cooked Original Recipe or Turkey Breakfast Sausage
1 (12 ounce) can Pillsbury® Grands!® refrigerated biscuits

cookingTips: Use pre-cooked sausage to save time and ensure proper cooking
Warm biscuits and sausage together for best texture
Assemble sliders just before serving to keep biscuits fresh
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Looking for quick breakfast options? This recipe is perfect for meal prep - would you like ideas for variations?
